Uses of Package
org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper

Packages that use org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper
org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper This package provides classes for Java Bean to RDF mapping. 
 

Classes in org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper used by org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper
BaseDeserializer
          Useful base class for writing a Deserializer.
BaseMapper
           
BaseSerializer
          Base class for serializer classes.
CriteriaDeserializer
          Defines a deserializer applicable on a specific type of classes.
CriteriaSerializer
          Decides wether or not a seriazer can be applied on an object.
DeserializationContext
          Context used for deserialization.
DeserializationException
          Defines any error occurred during deserialization.
DeserializationSupport
           
Deserializer
          Defines an object able to deserialize a class.
Identifier
          Defines the result of a serialization.
Issue
          Represents a non blocking error occurred while performing binding operations.
QueryEndpoint
          Endpoint to perform query on the triple data set.
SerializationContext
          Defines the context of serialization.
SerializationException
          Defines an exception occurred during serialization.
SerializationSupport
          Defines any method to provide serialization support.
Serializer
          This class serializes a specific bean.
